patthana15.40:1.1_0: Cetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.40:2.1_0: Cetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.40:3.1_0: Acetasikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naacetasiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
